actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1(12) of the Interstate Commerce Act to provide that railroads shall not discriminate against the movement or interchange of railroad refrigerator cars not owned by a railroad, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for railroads to discriminate against the movement or interchange of railroad refrigerator cars not owned by a railroad.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1(12) of the Interstate Commerce Act to provide that railroads shall not discriminate against the movement or interchange of railroad refrigerator cars not owned by a railroad, and for other purposes.
